channel.title: How do I change the model of a npc?
channel.description: Hi, I have recently started using a new client for my server, but the kbd comes up as a wierd cat type thing, and a green drag does as well.. How do i fix this? I know it is editing the models in the client, but how am I supposed to know which to edit?? Thanks.

item.title: How do I change the model of a npc?
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

get the new dragon models, add them to ur model folder, then open up class 5 (i think, cant remember right now) , add the ints for them save compile, login, you might have to add the models manually by typing in "add model (model number), or if u client preloads the cache it should load it by it self, so now spawn the dragons to check if it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the model of a npc?
